Description:
4 Port USB 3.0 PCI-E Expansion Card PCI Express PCIe USB 3.0 HUB Adapter 4-Port USB 3.0 Controller USB 3 0 PCI e PCIe Express


FAST USB 3.0 PCI-E PCIE 4 PORTS Express Expansion Card Adapter.

Super fast and high-capacity transfer solution, stable and reliable

Fully compatible with PCI Express Base Specification Revision 2.0

Supports simultaneous operation of multiple USB 3.0, USB 2.0, and USB 1.1 devices

Supports 4 downstream ports for all speeds

Built-in 4-pin power connector for receiving extra power supply from the system

Supports Windows 7 (32-bit/64-bit), Windows Vista (32-bit/64-bit), Windows XP
